thread.title: Mrs T Singer
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Mrs T Singer

author: Mrs T Singer
title: Mrs T Singer
text: We have had the best experiences with some really lovely people from all over the world. If you pick carefully and meet either in person or electronically to discuss 'assumptions & expectations' this is just the most successful way to be confident your much loved pet, and valued house, will be well taken care of.
